preqs: Students must be enrolled in the Master of Financial Mathematics or have passed one of the following units: MTH2010, MTH2015, MTH2032, MTH2040, MTH2222 OR ENG2005.  MTH2222 is highly recommended.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {S6001} Do Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ENG2005, MTH2010, MTH2015, MTH2032, MTH2040, MTH2222} Otherwise true

unitName: Time series and random processes in linear systems
description: Multivariate distributions. Estimation: maximum of likelihood and method of moments. Confidence intervals. Analysis in the time domain: stationary models, autocorrelation, partial autocorrelation. ARMA and ARIMA models. Analysis in the frequency domain (Spectral analysis): spectrum, periodigram, linear and digital filters, cross-correlations and cross-spectrum, spectral estimators, confidence interval for the spectral density. State-space models. Kalman filter. Empirical Orthogonal Functions and other Eigen Methods. Use of ITSM.
